#include <cstdio>

int main () {
    int testcases;
    scanf("%d", &testcases);

    int K;
    int remainder, multiples;
    while (testcases--) {
       scanf("%d", &K);
       remainder = K % 25;
       multiples = K / 25;

       if (remainder) {
           while (remainder >=0){
               printf("%c", remainder+'a');
               remainder--;
           }
       }

       while (multiples--) {
           printf("zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba");
       }
        
       printf("\n");

    }
    return 0;
}
